IntroductionÔÉÅ

odb4py is a C/Python interface designed to access ECMWF ODB1 databases. It provides direct access to ODB tables, columns, data, and metadata through SQL queries embedded in Python scripts.

The core of the project is implemented in pure C for performance and reliability. The routines handling the ODB1 format have been derived and pruned from the ECMWF ODB_API bundle version 0.18.1. necessary components required to build the runtime libraries used by odb4py.

The package is distributed as manylinux wheels and embeds the required ODB runtime libraries, allowing installation via pip without requiring an external ECMWF ODB installation.
